title: Jim Murphy – 2009 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Jim Murphy, the Secretary of State for Scotland, at the 2009 Labour Party conference.
content:
[![jimmurphy](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/jimmurphy.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/jimmurphy.jpg)

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund

Wherever I go in Scotland I am in awe not just of the beauty of our country but the brilliance of our people.
